alert.note: Alert for Kankakee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 6:29PM CDT until May 07 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Kankakee County in northeastern Illinois... Northern Newton County in northwestern Indiana... Southern Lake County in northwestern Indiana... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grant Park, or 7 miles northeast of Momence, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lowell, Momence, Lake Village, Roselawn, Grant Park, Shelby, Schneider, Thayer and Sumava Resorts. Including the following interstate... Indiana I-65 between mile markers 233 and 240. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
